about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Focused on eCommerce, Magento, and scalable software delivery
about.description: I am a senior developer and solutions architect with deep experience in Magento 2, PHP, and modern JavaScript ecosystems. I help brands and agencies ship high-converting stores, custom modules, and headless commerce experiences that scale. My work spans full-stack eCommerce development, API design, mobile apps, and DevOps so that projects are not only built right but also deployed and maintained reliably.
about.description2: I stay current with Adobe Commerce releases, PWA and headless trends, and cloud-native tooling so I can recommend and implement solutions that fit both technical and business goals.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: From eCommerce leads, technical directors, and project owners

items.quote: Krishna delivered our Magento 2 migration on time and our conversion rate improved. His knowledge of eCommerce and clean code made the project smooth.
We needed custom modules and API integrations that matched our B2B workflow. Krishna designed and built exactly that — reliable and well documented.
From headless storefront to DevOps setup, Krishna brought a full-stack perspective that saved us time and reduced risk. Highly recommend for eCommerce projects.
